item.title: Python Notebook
item.description:
Python基础知识总结:

python2/3的差异，python函数的参数传递，python的异常处理机制，python高级特性

item.title: Django Web Development
item.description: Django is a high-level Python Web framework that encourages rapid development and clean, pragmatic design. Built by experienced developers, it takes care of much of the hassle of Web development, so you can focus on writing your app without needing to reinvent the wheel. It’s free and open source.
